SELECT ROWNUM RN , SUB1.LIC_GRP_ID , SUB1.JEN_ID , SUB1.JEN_NM , SUB1.JEN_USR_ID , SUB1.JEN_USR_TOK , SUB1.JEN_URL , SUB1.JEN_DESC , SUB1.USE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', SUB1.USE_CD, '1') AS USE_NM , SUB1.REG_JOB_CNT , SUB1.DEL_CD , SUB1.REG_DTM , SUB1.REG_USR_ID , SUB1.REG_USR_IP , SUB1.MODIFY_DTM , SUB1.MODIFY_USR_ID , SUB1.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM ( SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.JEN_ID , A.JEN_NM , A.JEN_USR_ID , A.JEN_USR_TOK , A.JEN_URL , A.JEN_DESC , A.USE_CD , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STM9001 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.JEN_ID = A.JEN_ID) AS REG_JOB_CNT , A.DEL_CD , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM STM9000 A WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND DEL_CD ='02' ) SUB1 WHERE 1=1
AND SUB1.USE_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND SUB1.JEN_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB1.JEN_DESC LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC
ORDER BY SUB1.REG_DTM DESC

SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(NEW_JEN_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_JEN_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'JEN' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_JEN_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(JEN_ID) AS NEW_JEN_ID FROM STM9000 A WHERE 1=1 AND JEN_ID LIKE 'JEN' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
INSERT INTO STM9000 ( LIC_GRP_ID, JEN_ID, JEN_NM, JEN_USR_ID, JEN_USR_TOK , JEN_URL, JEN_DESC, USE_CD, DEL_CD, REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP, MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #licGrpId#, #newJenId#, #jenNm#, #jenUsrId#, #jenUsrTok# , #jenUrl#, #jenDesc#, #useCd#, '02', SYSDATE , #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp#, SYSDATE, #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE STM9000 SET JEN_ID = #jenId# , JEN_NM = #jenNm# , JEN_USR_ID = #jenUsrId# , JEN_USR_TOK = #jenUsrTok# , JEN_URL = #jenUrl# , JEN_DESC = #jenDesc# , USE_CD = #useCd# , MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND JEN_ID = #jenId#
UPDATE STM9000 SET DEL_CD = #delCd# , MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND JEN_ID = #jenId#
